sentences.en: All efforts of mediation by a third party were in vain at all.
sentences.cn: 第三方所作的从中调解的一切努力均告失败

sentences.en: All efforts of mediation by the third side were in vain at all.
sentences.cn: 第三方所作的从中调解的一切努力均告失败.

sentences.en: Both the listeners began to attach an importance to her mediation.
sentences.cn: 这两个人开始对她的游说重视起来.

sentences.en: Civil mediation is facing with the predicament at present.
sentences.cn: 在我国进入“诉讼时代”后,民间调解受到压制和质疑,面临困境.

sentences.en: Disputes must be settled using peaceful means, such as mediation and negotiation.
sentences.cn: 坚持以斡旋、调解、谈判等和平手段解决争端, 不应该动辄采取强制性行动.

sentences.en: Even if a marriage is doomed, the trend in family law is to resolve the dispute out of court, typically through mediation.
sentences.cn: 即使是一桩婚姻注定要遭受失败，在家庭法中也将是趋向于在法庭外解决争执，典型的是通过调解。

sentences.en: Even significant controversies may be settled through mediation.
sentences.cn: 即便是重大的争议都有可能通过调解解决.

sentences.en: I 5 eIFn ; 9 midI ` eFEn / n [ U ]: All offers of mediation were rejected.
sentences.cn: 所有调解的建议均遭拒绝.

sentences.en: Institutions at all levels of People's Mediation Mediation of disputes, 2986.
sentences.cn: 各级人民调解机构调解各类纠纷2986件.

sentences.en: It has been wisely negotiating with Syria via Turkey, and engaging Hamas on a truce deal through the mediation of Egypt.
sentences.cn: 它明智地透过土耳其与叙利亚谈判，并通过埃及的仲裁与哈马斯达成停战协议。

sentences.en: Labor dispute to reach an agreement through mediation, the parties should perform.
sentences.cn: 劳动争议经调解达成协议的, 当事人应当履行.

sentences.en: Only solve those existing problems, the people's mediation can play better efficiency and cost advantages, and prevent and dissolve the dispute.
sentences.cn: 解决好这几方面存在的问题才能更好发挥人民调解的效率与成本优势及预防、化解纠纷的能力。

sentences.en: Public institutions may establish mediation commissions of personnel disputes.
sentences.cn: 事业单位可以设立人事争议调解委员会.

sentences.en: The dispute was settled by mediation of the third country.
sentences.cn: 这场争端通过第三国的斡旋而得以解决.

sentences.en: The dispute was settled by mediation.
sentences.cn: 经调解使争端得以解决.

sentences.en: The effect of his mediation was so great that both parties sheathed the sword at once.
sentences.cn: 他的调停非常有效,双方立刻停战.

sentences.en: There is still a possibility the two sides could reach a compromise through the mediation of a third party.
sentences.cn: 通过第三方斡旋使双方达成妥协的可能性依然存在。

sentences.en: This works through the mediation of the central nervous system.
sentences.cn: 这是通过中枢神经系统的调节作用实现的。
